Author: Tallulah O'Hara
Description: On the 9th of November,1966, Paul McCartney was killed in a car crash. He was then replaced by a lookalike, often referred to a billy shears.

Article Title: The Perfect Book for Kids with Dyslexia
Author: Tallulah O'Hara
Description: Percy Jackson and the Lighting Thief by Rick Riordan was a life changing book as a young eight-year-old            with dyslexia.
After watching the Sound of Music, it brought me back to my childhood and reminded me of my own connections to the movie, from having a nanny growing up.
On New Year’s Eve, when I was eight years old, I found myself sitting in a family friend’s house in Sydney.
When hatred rises again, will we remain silent or speak out?
